message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional item carries a unique value that exceeds expectations and offers unparalleled benefits to those who utilize it. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $2000000. We believe in providing our esteemed clients with the best possible experience, and this investment is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset that will undoubtedly contribute significantly to your endeavors. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions.

Dear Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you're offering, and I'm willing to compromise to make a deal. What do you think?
